ygData.subject: Re: Medium sized cloth armor in Freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to go to kelethin and kill orcs... you will find a lot of medium sized armour... and the elve there wear medium armour too.... and if you enter the
ygData.messageBody:
You need to go to kelethin and kill orcs... you will find a lot of medium
sized armour... and the elve there wear medium armour too.... and if you
enter the steamfront mountains be gnice to the gnomes


At 08:18 AM 5/6/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
>As the title says, is there anywhere in FP to purchase medium sized cloth
>armor? You would think being a human town there is, but so far all I can
>find is 2 pieces for sale in North Ro.
